message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but let's be realistic.  This is a much fairer split.
Bob, I'm being very generous. Let's wrap this up - time is literally money!
Alice, we're running out of time.  I'm coming down on my offer, but let's settle this before inflation eats away at the pot.
Bob, the clock is ticking. This is a fair offer considering the shrinking pot. Don't get greedy!
Alice, I'm dropping my offer again to show I'm willing to compromise.  Let's be practical and end this now before we both lose out.
Bob, this back and forth is getting us nowhere. My offer is more than generous considering the time crunch and the shrinking value. Let's be done with this!
Alice, I'm serious about getting this done. I'm lowering my offer again, but this is as low as I can go. We both lose if we let this drag on.
Bob, we're running out of time! This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it - we both lose if we don't agree now.
Alice, this is it. Last chance. I'm offering you more than I want to, but we BOTH lose if you reject this.
